intro.title: Connect & Contribute
intro.description: At Roberto Save Dreams Foundation, we organize various events throughout the year to engage our community, share knowledge, raise funds, and create meaningful connections. From educational workshops to fundraising galas, our events provide opportunities to learn about our work, meet our team, and discover ways to get involved.

eventCategories.name: Fundraising Events
eventCategories.description: Galas, charity auctions, and campaigns that raise critical funds for our programs

eventCategories.name: Educational Workshops
eventCategories.description: Skills training, business development, and educational seminars for beneficiaries and supporters

eventCategories.name: Community Gatherings
eventCategories.description: Local events that bring together beneficiaries, donors, and community members

eventCategories.name: Virtual Events
eventCategories.description: Online webinars, discussions, and presentations accessible from anywhere

upcomingEvents.title: Annual Fundraising Gala 2023
upcomingEvents.description: Join us for our most prestigious event of the year, the Annual Fundraising Gala. This elegant evening will feature inspiring stories from our beneficiaries, a silent auction with exclusive items, gourmet dining, and entertainment. All proceeds will support our education and microloan programs across Africa.

upcomingEvents.title: Entrepreneurship Workshop Series
upcomingEvents.description: This hands-on workshop is designed for current and prospective microloan recipients. Learn essential business skills including financial management, marketing strategies, and sustainable business practices. The workshop will include interactive sessions, networking opportunities, and one-on-one consultations with business mentors.

upcomingEvents.title: Virtual Donor Briefing: Q3 Impact Report
upcomingEvents.description: Join our quarterly virtual briefing for donors and supporters to learn about our recent impact, ongoing projects, and future plans. Our program directors will share updates from the field, and you'll hear directly from beneficiaries whose lives have been transformed through your support.

upcomingEvents.title: Community Water Project Launch
upcomingEvents.description: Join us for the inauguration of our newest sustainable development initiative - a community water project in Mwanza Village, Tanzania. This project will provide clean, accessible water to over 500 families. The event will include a ribbon-cutting ceremony, community celebrations, and an opportunity to meet the local partners who made this project possible.

ticketInfo.note: This event is open to the public. No registration required.

pastEvents.title: Education for All Summit 2023
pastEvents.description: Our annual Education for All Summit brought together educators, policymakers, donors, and students to discuss innovative approaches to education in underserved communities. The two-day conference featured keynote speeches, panel discussions, and interactive workshops focused on improving educational outcomes across Africa.
highlights: Launch of our new scholarship program for girls in STEM
Partnerships formed with 5 new educational institutions

pastEvents.title: Virtual 5K Fundraiser
pastEvents.description: Our first-ever Virtual 5K Fundraiser allowed supporters from around the world to participate in a weekend-long event to raise funds for our education programs. Participants walked, ran, or biked 5 kilometers in their local communities while tracking their progress through our mobile app.

pastEvents.title: Microloan Program Graduation Ceremony
pastEvents.description: We celebrated the successful completion of our 2022-2023 Microloan Program cohort. 75 entrepreneurs graduated after completing their business training and successfully repaying their microloans. The ceremony featured presentations of their businesses, success stories, and a marketplace where graduates showcased their products and services.
highlights: 75 graduates with a 98% loan repayment rate

registration.title: Event Registration
registration.description: Registration for our events is quick and easy. Simply click the register button for the event you're interested in and complete the form. For paid events, you can complete your payment securely online.

process.title: Select an Event
process.description: Browse our upcoming events and click 'Register' for the one you'd like to attend.

process.title: Complete Registration Form
process.description: Fill out your personal information and any event-specific questions.

process.title: Payment (if applicable)
process.description: For paid events, complete your payment through our secure payment system.

process.title: Confirmation
process.description: Receive a confirmation email with event details and any necessary instructions.

faq.question: Can I register for multiple events at once?
faq.answer: Currently, you need to register for each event separately. This ensures we collect the right information for each specific event.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: For free events, please let us know if you can no longer attend so we can offer your spot to someone else. For paid events, refunds are available up to 7 days before the event. After that, we can transfer your registration to another person or convert it to a donation.

faq.question: Are there discounts available for students or groups?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer discounted rates for students (with valid ID) and for groups of 5 or more. Please contact events@robertosavedreams.org for more information.

hostYourOwn.description: Want to support our mission by hosting your own event? We provide resources and support for community fundraisers, awareness events, and more.

steps.title: Contact Us

steps.title: Plan Your Event
steps.description: We'll provide guidance, materials, and resources to help you plan a successful event.

steps.title: Promote & Host
steps.description: Spread the word and host your event. We can help with promotion through our channels.

steps.title: Share Your Impact
steps.description: After your event, we'll share how your contribution is making a difference.
